prompts: Right now in the deployed version live on ourchother.com it redirects the root to /login. Sup?
So we need to not redirect to /dashboard. We also want to change it so that the "Client Dashboard" link and links is a "Get started" link that goes to a booking form.

I like this, as a general ui design, but you wiped out the previous landing page structure and information. Can you make this new one more like the older messaging? This product is not the project management tool that we've built - the landing page is for potential clients. I offer AI automation consulting, AI business automation services, general AI productivity strategy consultation, custom software development, and just talking about AI and how to use it best.
Use a nice serif font for the h1 and some subheading elements. Use the one that we are using on the production website currently on the home page. Also add some subtle complexity to the background.
Even after restarting the server, I'm not seeing design changes and the home page is still redirecting to /login when not logged in.
Look at the @.playwright-mcp/localhost-landing-proof.png again. I'm looking at it and there is a sans serif h1, and a consistent cream colored background
ohh let's do a subtle dot grid and some subtle guiding lines on element borders like sketch lines .
